Package com.intellij.execution.configuration

Interface PersistentAwareRunConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, RunConfiguration, RunProfile

    public interface PersistentAwareRunConfiguration
extends RunConfiguration
    Interface for run configurations that need to customize serialization/deserialization of persistent state.
    See Also:
    com.intellij.execution.impl.RunnerAndConfigurationSettingsImpl

      • needsToBeMigrated

        boolean needsToBeMigrated()
        Returns whether the run configuration contains any data that must not be persisted within it anymore (eg. passwords).
